Source code for ossvt.natsort

# ---------------------------------------------------------
# natsort.py: Natural string sorting.
# ---------------------------------------------------------

# By Seo Sanghyeon.  Some changes by Connelly Barnes.


[docs]def try_int(s):
    "Convert to integer if possible."
    try: return int(s)
    except: return s



[docs]def natsort_key(s):
    "Used internally to get a tuple by which s is sorted."
    import re
    return map(try_int, re.findall(r'(\d+|\D+)', s))



[docs]def natcmp(a, b):
    "Natural string comparison, case sensitive."
    return cmp(natsort_key(a), natsort_key(b))



[docs]def natcasecmp(a, b):
    "Natural string comparison, ignores case."
    return natcmp(a.lower(), b.lower())



[docs]def natsort(seq, cmp=natcmp):
    "In-place natural string sort."
    seq.sort(cmp)
    


[docs]def natsorted(seq, cmp=natcmp):
    "Returns a copy of seq, sorted by natural string sort."
    import copy
    temp = copy.copy(seq)
    natsort(temp, cmp)
    return temp
